citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
On routine inspection, there are several expired vaccines, medications, and supplements including Intranasal Bordetella
Canine Adenovirus Type 2- Parainfluenza- Bordetella Bronchiseptica vaccines, Clavamox drops, Penicillin injectable,
Epinephrine, Liquid dewormer, Vit B Complex injectable, Pyrantel, Amoxicillin powder, and canine multivitamins. The use
of expired vaccines, medications, and supplements can be ineffective and lead to unnecessary animal illness or
discomfort. The facility must ensure the use of appropriate methods to prevent, control, diagnose, and treat diseases and
injuries. The licensee must ensure all vaccines, medications, and supplements on-hand are not expired. The facility
corrected this at time of inspection on June 10, 2025, by throwing expired vaccines, medications, and supplements away.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
On routine inspection, there are several expired vaccines, medications, and supplements including Intranasal Bordetella 
Canine Adenovirus Type 2- Parainfluenza- Bordetella Bronchiseptica vaccines, Clavamox drops, Penicillin injectable, 
Epinephrine, Liquid dewormer, Vit B Complex injectable, Pyrantel, Amoxicillin powder, and canine multivitamins. The use 
of expired vaccines, medications, and supplements can be ineffective and lead to unnecessary animal illness or 
discomfort. The facility must ensure the use of appropriate methods to prevent, control, diagnose, and treat diseases and 
injuries. The licensee must ensure all vaccines, medications, and supplements on-hand are not expired. The facility 
corrected this at time of inspection on June 10, 2025, by throwing expired vaccines, medications, and supplements away. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
